text: Marek Galiński (1 August 1974 - 17 March 2014) was a Polish professional mountain biker. He won eight Polish national championship titles. He also competed for Poland in the Summer Olympics in 1996, 2000, 2004, and 2008. He was born in Opoczno. Galiński was killed in a car accident on 17 March 2014 in Jędrzejów. He was 39 years old. He was outlived by wife and two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Marek Galiński at Cycling Archives Category:1974 births Category:2014 deaths Category:1996 Summer Olympics Category:2000 Summer Olympics Category:2004 Summer Olympics Category:2008 Summer Olympics Category:Polish cyclists Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Road accident deaths
title: Marek Galiński
